holidays.title: British Summer Time Begins
holidays.description: ‘Spring forward, fall back.’ British Summer Time (BST) occurs on the last Sunday of March and represents the phenomenon when the clocks go forward in…

holidays.title: Grass is Always Browner on the Other Side of the Fence Day
holidays.description: Learn how to appreciate your own life with our great tips and information on this day.

holidays.title: Land Day
holidays.description: Rise up with us as we commemorate Palestine’s resistance to Israel’s land acquisition.

holidays.title: Mothering Sunday U.K.
holidays.description: Roll out the pipes, hymns, and musical instruments as we celebrate Mothering Sunday in style!

holidays.title: National Fitness Recovery Day
holidays.description: This March 30 will be your recovery day from your daily exercise routine!

holidays.title: National Folding Laundry Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Folding Laundry Day by folding up that growing pile of clothes.

holidays.title: National I Am In Control Day
holidays.description: The day is commemorated for two reasons. Read on to find out.

holidays.title: National Julia Day
holidays.description: Julias, stay tuned as we delve deep to find out the origin of your name.

holidays.title: National Pencil Day
holidays.description: Did you know that one pencil can write up to 45,000 words?

holidays.title: National Victoria Day
holidays.description: The name Victoria symbolizes a strong and independent woman and is both classic and elegant.

holidays.title: National Virtual Vacation Day
holidays.description: Do you know that you can travel the world while sitting in your armchair?

holidays.title: National Wendy Day
holidays.description: Wendy's roots are distinct. National Wendy Day celebrates the moniker made famous by "Peter Pan."

holidays.title: Ougadi
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Ougadi, the time to get yourself ready for a new beginning.

holidays.title: Pretzel Sunday
holidays.description: Now’s the time to buy your crush a pretzel with love notes from the heart!

holidays.title: Spiritual Baptist Liberation Day
holidays.description: The abolition of the religious restriction in 1951 is commemorated on Spiritual Baptist Liberation Day.

holidays.title: Take a Walk in the Park Day
holidays.description: Invest in your health without spending any money!

holidays.title: Torrents Day
holidays.description: Get torrenting with our great tips and information right here on Torrents Day.

holidays.title: Turkey Neck Soup Day
holidays.description: There’s nothing like the aroma of a simmering soup to add joy on this day.

holidays.title: World Bipolar Day
holidays.description: Living with bipolar disorder is not easy, “but keep heart, it will turn out all right.”

holidays.title: World Tb-303 Appreciation day
holidays.description: Celebrate an indispensable part of music history this World TB-303 Appreciation Day.

holidays.title: Celine Dion’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented artist was one of the few to be crowned “The Queen of Pop.”

holidays.title: Eric Clapton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Few people have ever handled the guitar as well as the legendary Eric Clapton.

holidays.title: NF’s Birthday
holidays.description: N.F. is a talented and driven artist, who has created a successful musical career.

holidays.title: Vincent van Gogh’s Birthday
holidays.description: Vincent van Gogh’s imagination was unlike any other, and it lives on through his work.
